parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.

parse: Demonstrative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: This; he, she, it.

parse: Conjunction
str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To come, go.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Pain, grief, sorrow, affliction. Apparently a primary word; sadness.

parse: Preposition
str2: From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Active
str2: A primary verb; to be 'cheer'ful, i.e. Calmly happy or well-off; impersonally, especially as salutation, be well.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.

parse: Preposition
str2: On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Adjective - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Conjunction
str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Feminine 1st Person Singular
str2: My, mine. From the oblique cases of ego; my.

parse: Noun - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: Joy, gladness, a source of joy. From chairo; cheerfulness, i.e. Calm delight.
